query: FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.cp.CpPontoBean ponto WHERE ponto.caracteristica.idCaracteristica IN (SELECT caracteristica.idCaracteristica FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.sn.SnCaracteristicaBean caracteristica WHERE caracteristica.idSegmentoNegocios = (SELECT caracteristica1.idSegmentoNegocios FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.sn.SnCaracteristicaBean caracteristica1 WHERE caracteristica1.idCaracteristica = :idCaracteristica)) AND ponto.proposta.idProposta = :idProposta AND ponto.tipoPonto.idTipoPonto IN (5,6)
SELECT ponto.idPonto FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.cp.CpPontoBean ponto WHERE ponto.proposta.idProposta = :idProposta AND ponto.tipoPonto.idTipoPonto = 5
SELECT ponto.idPonto FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.cp.CpPontoBean ponto WHERE ponto.proposta.idProposta = :idProposta AND ponto.caracteristica.idCaracteristica = :idCaracteristica

SELECT ponto.produto.idProduto FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.cp.CpPontoBean ponto WHERE ponto.proposta.idProposta = :idProposta AND ponto.tipoPonto.idTipoPonto = :idTipoPonto AND ponto.caracteristica.idCaracteristica IN (SELECT caracteristica.idCaracteristica FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.sn.SnCaracteristicaBean caracteristica WHERE caracteristica.idSegmentoNegocios = (SELECT caracteristica1.idSegmentoNegocios FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.sn.SnCaracteristicaBean caracteristica1 WHERE caracteristica1.idCaracteristica = :idCaracteristica))
SELECT ponto.idPonto FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.cp.CpPontoBean ponto WHERE ponto.proposta.idProposta = :idProposta AND ponto.produto.idProduto = :idProduto
SELECT ponto.idPonto, ponto.produto.idProduto FROM br.com.netservicos.core.bean.cp.CpPontoBean ponto WHERE ponto.proposta.idProposta = :idProposta AND ponto.tipoPonto.idTipoPonto = 5
